requestGeoJson.title: Request geo JSON
requestGeoJson.description: A value indicating whether we should request GeoJSON from the WFS server.  If this propertyand WebFeatureServiceCatalogItem's requestGeoJson are both true, we'll request GeoJSON first andonly fall back on trying GML if the GeoJSON request fails.

requestGml.title: Request gml
requestGml.description: A value indicating whether we should request GML from the WFS server.  If this propertyand WebFeatureServiceCatalogItem's requestGeoJson are both true, we'll request GeoJSON first andonly fall back on trying GML if the GeoJSON request fails.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: The additional parameters to pass to the WFS server when requesting geometry.All parameter names must be entered in lowercase in order to be consistent with references in TerrisJS code.
